import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from 'react' import { IconButton } from '@material-ui/core' import { emojiInput } from '../../helpers/message/emoji' function ButtonCreate() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const [text, setText] = useState() const inputRef = useRef(null) const [anchorEl, setAnchorEl] = useState(null) return (
setOpen(true)}> button
setOpen(false)} className="header"> x
